base_description: Tall, rectangular, white dresser with three drawers.
part_description: Three large, horizontal drawers stacked vertically with handles, enclosed in a rectangular frame.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly along tracks within the frame. The handles are attached to the front of each drawer, providing leverage for opening and closing. The drawers are spaced evenly, allowing for balanced weight distribution and easy access to contents.
external_interaction_description: The dresser stands on a flat surface, interacting with the floor to maintain stability. It can be positioned against a wall to save space. People interact with it by pulling the handles to open drawers for storage or retrieval of items.
